content: «Opportunities require that we act by faith, confidence and use our beautiful minds to think of bright, new ideas. Your ideas will lead you to opportunities.» As always, right in the target. It looks like you are secretely reading our minds, and when you think we need a push or a jump, you provoke it! Thanks a lot for writing ‘black on white’ the motivation that should be inside us, and most of the time, it is, but we simply do not know how to find it. All the best.
